meanings.sent2: He painted the wall misdone, with streaks and smudges everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked misdone, but it tasted surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent4: The plan was misdone from the start, leading to chaos.
meanings.sent5: The homework assignment was so misdone that the teacher couldn't even read it.

meanings.sent1: He misdone by lying to his friend.
meanings.sent2: She misdone when she stole the cookies from the jar.
meanings.sent3: The cat misdone by knocking over the vase.
meanings.sent4: Betraying his team was the ultimate misdone in his career.
meanings.sent5: The criminal misdone by breaking into the house.
